trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There were no other sightings in Lee's Summit on or around June 30th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI live close to a commuter airport in Lee's Summit, MO and know what helicopters and planes look like, plus they all have flashing lights and make noise. This orb pulsated, orange, moved at the appearent speed of a helicopter, no sound and under the cloud cover in a straigh flight path until it appeared to accelerate and ascend through the clouds shrinking into a small white ball, too fast and straight to be a balloon or lantern. Note, this was under the clouds, so it wasn't a planet, space station or satelite. This was the best of 5 sightings I've had in the last month over Lee's Summit, MO (suburb of Kansas City). I've never seen them before. My wife, a devot Catholic, and non believer in UFO's or Aliens witnessed one with me on 4th of July and is freaking out. I'm an engineer, trained to think logically, and I can't explain these sitings. It's very disturbing.
Summary: Orange orb under cloud cover moving due north. Ascended thru clouds out of site. Pulsating, not flashing. Speed of helicopter.
